Articles.Content:
Hello,

I am having an annoying issue. It just happened a while ago. I had an SSTO orbiting Kerbin, when I choose it from space center its delta wing explodes saying it has exploded at launch pad!! Then I decided to quit game and return and the annoying thing started here. Now, I can not load any of my saved games in the main menu. I just started a new career and came back to load it and it didn't work also... 

My career mode is so crucial because I am uploading videos on Youtube from that. It is so strange but that thing doesn't allow me play the game.

 

edit: Now tried and saw that I am not able to run those Scenarios also. Just Kerbal Engineer Redux, Chatterer and Asteroid Day mods are installed and playing on Macbook.

Edited January 11, 2016 by ondert
